headline: U.S. Navy sends ship near disputed island in South China Sea
content: By Barbara Starr and Joshua Berlinger, CNNUpdated 0359 GMT (1159 HKT) February 1, 2016  (CNN)The U.S. Navy sent a ship near a contested island in the South China Sea on Saturday to challenge "excessive maritime claims that restrict the rights and freedoms of the United States and others," a U.S. Defense Department spokesman told CNN.CNN's Steven Jiang contributed to this report
